trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Santa Rosa
There was one other sighting in Santa Rosa on or around December 31st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving making a left hand turn on Piner Rd in Santa Rosa when my boyfriend said "what is that" and pointed to the sky. I looked up and wax immediately intrigued by a larger triangle formation approximately 300 feet above ground. The lights (three of them) were bluish-white and had a strange glow to them. I knew immediately they were not stars ANC they were definitely not an air plane. There was no sound coming from the object at all. After staring in awe for approximately 2 minutes one by one the lights disappeared.
Summary: Three lights in a triangle formation appeared and then one by one the lights disappeared.
